short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sticky Notes New Tab adds sticky notes to your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sticky Notes New Tab offers markdown-friendly, draggable, and minimizable sticky notes for your new tab page. It also features a calculator, canvas for drawing, a timer, games, movies, and a customizable search engine bar that supports Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo. Users can drag and edit shortcuts, tailor the date and time display, select from a variety of default gradient wallpapers, modify the background color, and delve into numerous other personalization options.
